item.description:
Just realized we haven't been to this wonderful place as a group since February of 2011 (way too long for my liking). Join fellow Members and Guests of the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group for a short notice Wednesday night dinner @ Lime Leaf in Weymouth.

Link to Yelp: http://www.yelp.com/biz/lime-leaf-weymouth

This will be a great opportunity to have some time to meetup with other members for a fun evening. Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the meal, including but not limited to, your drinks, food, tax, and tip and any shared items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Dinner @ Lime Leaf

Wednesday, November 28th, 2012 @ 6:30 pm
435 Columbian St
Weymouth, MA 02190
339-499-5350
Website: http://www.thaifooddirect.com/limeleaf/#/about

 

Meeting Location: Inside the front door. If you arrive after we are seated the reservation is under Alison

Organizer(s):Alison

Min/Max: Min of 4 people 24 hours in advance. Maximum of 12  Guests: 1 per member

Fees: Annual Members FREE, Group Members - $2; $5 to become a 2013 Annual Member.

RSVP Deadline: 4PM on Wednesday, November 28th. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer and will be considered a No-Show per our guidelines on the About Us page. Inclement Weather: Please see our Weather policy on the About pages. We will update this section a few days before if the forecast calls for more than light flurries.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

Please click on restaurant link provided below and click directions link for google maps.

http://www.thaifooddirect.com/limeleaf/#/about
item.how_to_find_us: We will be waiting inside the entrance.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: I'm in the mood for Thai...................
